pr_title: fix(iot-dev): Fix possible null pointer issue in amqp layer

timeline.message: fix(iot-dev): Fix possible null pointer issue in amqp layer

timeline.bodyText: shouldn't we mark an unknown error code to not be retryable?
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText: That isn't the current behavior. Down below, if the error code doesn't match any known code, we return the same exception
replies.author: timtay-microsoft
